c74object.name: hoa.fx.mirror~
c74object.digest: An ambisonic sound field mirror processor.
c74object.description: hoa.fx.mirror~ applies a weight on the negatives harmonics to create the mirror image of a sound field to itself. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.
